+5% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital when connected via [ICON_TURNS_REMAINING] Domestic Trade Route. +10% [ICON_FOOD] Growth in this city if connected to the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital via rail.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reduces enemy spy stealing rate by 25%. Increases [ICON_JFD_BLUE_FIST] Loyalty by 5%.

Our people are now touring your fairytale castles and attending your fantastical operas. They may also be binging a bit much. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
Found the Bavarian State Orchestra

We adore music! Sweet melodies positively set our heart at ease and our head into a dream. In such trying times, music can be good for the soul. So let us create a state orchestra by which all Bavarians can set their hearts and souls to rest![NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Bavaria [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have built the Musician's Guild [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Musician stationed in the Capital [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Musician [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Musician's Guild yields +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Rate of [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Musician generation increased by 25%

We adore music! Sweet melodies positively set our heart at ease and our head into a dream. In such trying times, music can be good for the soul. So let us create a state orchestra by which all Bavarians can set their hearts and souls to rest![NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Musician's Guild yields +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Rate of [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Cultural Great People generation increased by 20%
Ludwig II of Bavaria has founded the Bavarian State Orchestra
Design Blueprints for a new Wonder

Only we, as her great visionary, can conceive of the beauty needed for Bavaria to become the cultural centre of the world. Let us call together the greatest engineers and artists in the nation, and have them guide our vision in the creation of a new architectural marvel.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Bavaria [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]At least one city must be constructing a Wonder [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Medieval Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production toward all current Wonders in production [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost is equal to ten times your currrent [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: The amount of [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production received is equal to five times your current [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output

Only we, as her great visionary, can conceive of the beauty needed for Bavaria to become the cultural centre of the world. Let us call together the greatest engineers and artists in the nation, and have them guide our vision in the creation of a new architectural marvel.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A lump sum of [ICON_PRODUCTION] Wonder Production
Choose a City
Select
Select the city where your new Wonder is being developed
This will boost the current [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in {1_CityName} by {2_Amount}
The Illuminati

Whispers of a secret society calling themselves The Illuminati have emerged within our court. These "enlightened" minds advocate for women's education and equality, and for the devolution of the powers of faith in public life. These absurd notions cannot be allowed to fester.[NEWLINE]
Outlaw this blasphemous nuisance!
Bah. What harm could they do?
They seem fun. Let's ask to join them.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith and {3_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]10% chance that a catastrophic event will occur in the future[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith and {2_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All Spies are levelled up[ENDCOLOR]
We have outlawed the Illuminati and had their secret society dissolved. We shall surely hear nothing from them again.
We have chosen to let the secret society of the Illuminati be. We shall surely never come to regret this decision.
We have decided to join the secret society of the Illuminati. Perhaps we can put their secret knowledge to use in our government.
JFD: The Illuminati
Instant Spy Level
Ludwig II of Bavaria has outlawed the Illuminati; an exclusive group of intellectuals claiming to be enlightened.
The New World Order
The New World Order has come.[NEWLINE]
Darn.
As above, so below.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]A New World Order dawns[ENDCOLOR]
A New World Order has dawned.
Pressures to Produce an Heir

The Ministers of our government have become simply ridiculous in their beratement of us for our lack of interest in seeking a women with whom to produce an heir. One of them even had the gall to accuse us of impotency! This simply cannot be tolerated and undermines the legitimacy of the Bavarian throne.[NEWLINE]
Very well. I shall seek a bride immediately.
My romantic affairs shall remain at my discretion alone.
For what do I need an heir? I'm immortal!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The Capital gains 10 turns of 'We Love the King Day.'[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a 5 turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age[ENDCOLOR]
We have conceded to taking a bride, though this is by no means assurance of an heir.
We have declined to take a bride. Rumours of our romantic indiscretions shall continue to permeate the court.
We have asserted our immortality and suspended the suspension of disbelief.
Ludwig II of Bavaria has come under scrutiny over his failure to produce an heir.
New Opera

The great Richard Wagner has once again astounded the world with the creation of a magnificent new opera. Our devotion to Wagner's craft predicates that we simply cannot miss the premiere of this new masterpiece.[NEWLINE]
I must have a private showing!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
We shall invite all the world's leaders to the premiere.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Other Civilizations gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE][ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+10% [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from the Musician's Guild[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Note: this option may only be chosen once
Yawn...
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
We have attended a private showing of Richard Wagner's new opera.
We have invited all the world to the premiere of Richard Wagner's new opera.
Ludwig II has invited you to the premiere of Richard Wagner's newest Opera.
